function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete understanding of the efficacy of direct UVGI on intraoperative air quality and prevention of infection","Impact":"Increased risk of surgical site infections and airborne bacterial contaminants","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive studies to define the relative efficacy of direct UVGI and its optimization in association with other infection prevention methods","Technologies":"Comprehensive study protocols and data analysis tools","People":"Patients, healthcare workers in the operating room","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Limited effectiveness of UVGI at high air change rates (ACH)","Impact":"Diminished UVGI efficacy and increased risk of exposure to airborne contaminants","Mitigation":"Maximizing UVGI effectiveness by optimizing its deployment at low ACH and minimizing exposure time at high ACH","Technologies":"UVGI deployment optimization tools and exposure time monitoring systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers in the operating room","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, engineering firms"},{"Description":"NIOSH hierarchy of controls approach not being followed for personnel safety","Impact":"Increased risk of hazardous exposure for employees in the operating room","Mitigation":"Implementing the hierarchy of controls approach to eliminate or substitute the hazardous agent or source of exposure before using direct UVGI in the operating room","Technologies":"Hierarchy of controls framework and safety assessment tools","People":"Healthcare workers in the operating room","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, personnel safety management teams"}]}
